title: # 453 - Nick Thune & ME
description:
Today I sit down with comedian Nick Thune. We talk about Nick getting a parasite, rock climbing accidents, scuba diving, bad corporate gigs, Brody Stevens, and much more! 

 

Nick’s new movie “The Right One” is available on Apple or Amazon Prime!

 

Check out my new show “Go Big Show” Thursdays at 9pm PST on TBS! 

 

This episode is also brought to you by cbdMD. Get 25% OFF your next order when you use the promo code “BERT” at checkout. Go to http://www.cbdmd.com and use the code “Bert” at checkout. 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Vuori. Receive 20% off your first purchase, but enjoy free shipping on any U.S. orders over $75 and free returns. Go to http://www.vuoriclothing.com/BERT and discover the versatility of Vuori Clothing.

 

This episode is also brought to you by Better Help. Get 10% off your first month with the discount code “BERT”. Get started today at http://www.betterhelp.com/bert  

 

This episode is also brought to you by Babbel. Right now, when you purchase a 3-month Babbel subscription, you’ll get an additional 3 months for FREE. That’s 6 months, for the price of 3! Just go to http://www.babbel.com and use promo code “BERT”.

 

This episode is also brought to you by 1-800 Contacts. So, let 1-800 Contacts get you the contacts lenses you need. Order online at http://www.1800contacts.com   

 

This episode is also brought to you by Intuit TurboTax Live. File with the help of an expert or let an expert file for you at http://www.turbotax.com 

 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com 

Twitter: http://www.Twitter.com/bertkreischer 

Facebook: http://www.Facebook.com/BertKreischer 

Instagram: http://www.Instagram.com/bertkreischer 

Youtube: http://www.Youtube.com/user/Akreischer
